## Type of Change

- [ ] New feature (non-breaking change which adds functionality)

- [ ] RBAC system enhancement
- [ ] Testing improvement

## Integration Impact

- [ ] Affects shadcn/ui components

- [ ] No integration impact

- [ ] E2E tests pass
